sorcer.service

Class ServiceExertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.service.ServiceExertion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Evaluation<Object>, ExecState, Exertion, Identifiable, Invocation<Object>, Revaluation, Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IfExertion, Job, Task, WhileExertion

    public abstract class ServiceExertion
extends Object
implements Service, Exertion, Revaluation, ExecState, Serializable

      • service

        public Exertion service(Exertion exertion,
               Transaction txn)
                 throws TransactionException,
                        ExertionException,
                        RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: Service
        A generic service request as specified by an exertion - a generic service message. It can be carried out dynamically and indirectly by any Service peer and directly by a Service matching the exertion's method Signature.
        Specified by:
        service in interface Service
        Parameters:
        exertion - an input exertion
        txn - The transaction (if any) under which to provide service.
        Returns:
        a resulting exertion
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a transaction error occurs
        ExertionException - if an exertion invocation failed for any reason
        RemoteException

      • exert

        public <T extends Exertion> T exert(Transaction txn,
                           Parameter... entries)
                         throws TransactionException,
                                ExertionException,
                                RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: Exertion
        Sends this exertion to the assigned service provider if set. If a service provider is not set then in runtime it bounds to any available provider that matches this exersion's signature of the PROCESS type.
        Specified by:
        exert in interface Exertion
        Parameters:
        txn - The transaction (if any) under which to exert.
        Returns:
        a resulting exertion
        Throws:
        TransactionException - if a transaction error occurs
        ExertionException - if processing this exertion causes an error
        RemoteException

        Returns a process signature, all pre-processing, post-processing, and append signatures. There is only one process signature defining late binding to the service provider processing this exertion.

      • getFlowType

        public Strategy.Flow getFlowType()
        Description copied from interface: Exertion
        Returns a flow type for this exertion execution. A flow type indicates if this exertion can be executed sequentially, in parallel, or concurrently with other component exertions within this exertion. The concurrent execution requires all mapped inputs in the exertion dataContext to be assigned before this exertion can be executed.
        Specified by:
        getFlowType in interface Exertion
        Returns:
        a flow type
        See Also:
        Flow}.

      • getAccessType

        public Strategy.Access getAccessType()
        Description copied from interface: Exertion
        Returns a provider access type for this exertion execution. An access type indicates whether the receiving provider specified in the exertion's process signature is accessed directly (Acess.PUSH) or indirectly (Acess.PULL) via a shared exertion space.
        Specified by:
        getAccessType in interface Exertion
        Returns:
        an access type
        See Also:
        Access}.

      • isJob

        public boolean isJob()
        Description copied from interface: Exertion
        Returns true if this exertion requires execution by a Jobber, otherwise false if this exertion requires its execution by a Tasker. Note that control follow exertion can be processed by either a Tasker or a Jobber.
        Specified by:
        isJob in interface Exertion
        Returns:
        true if this exertion requires execution by a Jobber.
